sneckomod:SneckoSoul.NAME: Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #ysneckomod:Unknown card into your deck, increase your Max HP by #b1.

sneckomod:SneckoLibrary.NAME: Snecko Library
sneckomod:SneckoLibrary.FLAVOR: Page 132: Roll threes on big attack turns.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start the game with #b6 #ysneckomod:Unknown cards. Obtain an additional card reward every #b6 combats. One card in each card reward is replaced with a #ysneckomod:Unknown card.
